title: Exit Playback: Console View
custom_preconds: GIVEN the User has launched a game video to full screen playback
custom_steps: WHEN Game video playback is full screen And user exits video playback (Siri remote: presses the MENU button or Nimbus steel series controller: B back button)
custom_expected: THEN user will be bought to the Console view and will observe: * Video tile in upper right area * Line Score Upper left (below MLB Logo) * Pitcher/Batter (below line score) * Today's Games (along bottom) See zpl.io/1Bq8Oo

title: Exit Console View: Games View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are signed in with valid premium subscription.
AND user is in Console view: has launched a game video to full screen playback then exits video playback (Siri remote: presses the MENU button or Nimbus steel series controller: B back button)
custom_steps: WHEN we press the MENU button on the Siri remote
custom_expected: THEN user will be brought to the Scores view (day schedule) of the day launched from

title: Console View LEFT - Archive Playback Complete
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are signed in with valid premium subscription.
AND user is in Console view: has launched an Archive game video to full screen playback - then exits video playback (Siri remote: presses the MENU button or Nimbus steel series controller: B back button)
custom_expected: THEN user will be brought to the Games view (day schedule) of the day launched from

title: Console View LEFT - Live Playback Complete
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are signed in with valid premium subscription.
AND user is in Console view: has launched a LIVE game video to full screen playback then exits video playback (Siri remote: presses the MENU button or Nimbus steel series controller: B back button)
custom_expected: THEN user will be brought to the Games view (day schedule) of the day launched from

title: Console View Left: Switch Game via Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Signed in with valid premium subscription
At least one live game is available to launch (not blacked out)
User is in Console view: has launched a game video to full screen playback and backed out to Console via MENU
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates down to Game Tiles
AND Launches any game
custom_expected: THEN the current playback halts, and Home Feed for chosen game begins to play

title: Console View: Double Play Launch
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into a Premium account
custom_steps: WHEN the user is in Console View And they Nav to Right via swipe
custom_expected: Then Double Play view will display: * Video tile @ left side of screen w/ game status underneath (if scores on) * Select a second game prompt @ right side of screen * Todays' game tiles list along the bottom of the screen (to choose from) AND when we choose a game, it will launch to Double Play View with currently launched game in focus

title: Double Play: Game Switching
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Premium subscription user signed in
AND 2 or more live games available
AND Live game launched and exited to Console view
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to right via swipe
AND the second game is launched
AND the user switches back and forth between games
custom_expected: THEN the  User can choose focus * Audio plays appears for focused game * Highlighted state appears for focused game * Nav/appearance is as expected * Double Play view does not get into any errant states (screens cut off, glitches, etc)

custom_preconds:

AND user is in Console view: has launched a game video to full screen playback then exits video playback (Siri remote: presses the MENU button or Nimbus steel series controller: B back button)
custom_steps: WHEN we press the MENU button on the Siri remote
custom_expected: THEN user will be brought to the Scores view (day schedule) of the day launched from

custom_preconds:

custom_expected: THEN user will be brought to the Games view (day schedule) of the day launched from

custom_expected: THEN user will be brought to the Games view (day schedule) of the day launched from

title: Console View Right: Switch Game via launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Signed in with valid premium subscription
AND there is at least one live game is available to launch (not blacked out)
AND the User is in Console view: has launched a game video to full screen playback and backed out to Console via MENU
custom_steps: WHEN the user  Navigates to Double Play launch Launch a second game Navigate to the right to view Console View Right Navigate down to Game Tiles Launch any game
custom_expected: Current playback halts and Home Feed for chosen game begins to play

title: Console View RIGHT - Archive Playback Complete
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are signed in with valid premium subscription.
AND user is in Console view: has launched an Archive game video to full screen playback then exits video playback (Siri remote: presses the MENU button or Nimbus steel series controller: B back button)
AND has launched a second game in Double Play
AND has moved to Console View RIGHT orientation
AND the 1st game is still playing (Console LEFT)
custom_expected: THEN user will be brought to Console View LEFT

title: Console View RIGHT - Live Playback Complete
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are signed in with valid premium subscription.
AND user is in Console view: has launched a LIVE game video to full screen playback then exits video playback (Siri remote: presses the MENU button or Nimbus steel series controller: B back button)
AND has launched a second game in Double Play
AND has moved to Console View RIGHT orientation
AND the 1st game is still playing (Console LEFT)
custom_expected: THEN user will be brought to Console View LEFT

title: Postseason / Spring Training / Preseason Only: "No other games" message
custom_preconds:
***Note: Only applicable (and testable) in Prod during Postseason / Spring Training / Preseason as this test requires a "No Games Scheduled" Status for Today.***

GIVEN that there are no games on the schedule Today
AND we have launched the app
AND we are logged in to a Premium account
custom_steps: WHEN we launch Archive playback of any game AND we then back out to Console View via Menu
custom_expected: THEN we see the expected Console View with nav disabled AND a message appears in the Games area below: "There are no other games available to view in Double Play"
